reviews.review:
Portal jako série je momenty velmi vtipná. Já samotný mám rád příběh Portalu.
Ovšem doporučuji hrát Portal 2 na rychlejších zařízeních.
it is fun and i finished it in 5 hours but for new pklayers maybe it will be like 6. fun and mind boggling.
Эта игра-настоящий шедевр!!!!! Здесь великолепно все: юмор, сюжет, геймплей. Плюс есть КООП
Игра хороша, чтоб вместе с другом посидеть подумать .Помогло работать в команде и обдумывать все детали советую другим .Я с другом прошел от А до Я (очень понравилось жду таких же игр )
the game story is great and the controls are perfect. I do recommend a mouse and if you have a mac be prepared to see some bugs.
Гра - дуже крута і весела, до того ж змушує працювати не тільки спинний мозок)
it made my brain big and i saw the moon which was cool
I don't need to write a review on this game, it's already in your library and you've beaten it 2 or 3 times.

WOW, this is one of my favorite, and one of the greatest games ever. the comedy, story, characters, voice actors, atmosphere, graphics, sound design, and all around charm are so incredible. now this is the point where you might think "oh so the gameplay must be sacrificed by this" NONONO!! this is some of the greatest game and puzzle design i have ever experienced! and even if you aren't much of a puzzle fan, much as i was when i picked this game up, GET IT ANYWAYS, GET IT NOW! because this is just pure fun. now make portal 3!

게임의 엔딩을 보고 생각했습니다. 그리고 안도했습니다.
"난. 멍청하지 않다."
재미있는 게임입니다.
아직 엔딩 못 본 사람 없죠~?
Jest trudniejsza i dłóższa od pierwszej częśći portalu.
虽然是很多年前的游戏，但是画面和难度射击都还不错。
This is a great game for those looking for a story-based, comedic puzzle game. It's original and very good quality. I highly recommend it!
Really fun game! Especially if you play with a friend :D
10/10 get it now if ur in to puzzels and is a big brain

this...game...is amazing...such likable characters. the comedy is genius and extremely quotable. portal 2 is such a perfect game that you can play it over and over again and never have it get old
.

One of the best Valve Games I have ever played even with logging countless hours on CSS and CS 1.6. Best storyline though for a series I have ever played and fully immersive with countless replayability.
Guys it's portal 2 why don't you already have it in your library duh.

Single player is satisfying and has a great and funny story, and co-op is a blast that encourages only the best kind of psychological warfare. This game should be $100.00- go ahead and grab it for $10.00!

I like how this game really makes you think. I've spent a lot of time playing on multiplayer and its fun to collaborate in, especially since its logic based. So you and your partner can put your brains to work and "compete" to see who figures it out the quickest. I especially like the snarky remarks from the narrator that pit you against your partner.

The other time the game got SPOILED by the "psychologist" of the police, which IS NOT the police, but is the Homeland Security abuser, which is like to involve the US citizens in the street drug dealership, and for that purposes he needs to screw up the human live and involve into the narco-traffickins drugs salings and usings by the permanent radio-hypnosis harassment and discredits on the game glitches.
  I want the game has no glitches and no military forts infections for the "Selective Services" urological problems and depressions.
This is an amazing game, its better than the original game but both are still amazing and i totally recommend that you play this game.
Still to this day one of the greatest games ever made and personally my favorite Valve game.
Es un juego muy bueno, te hace pensar mucho pero a la vez te divierte y aun más si lo juegas con amigos.
Played years ago through the single-player campaign. Now going through the Co-op mode with my partner and it's just as good!

This game is amazing. You must play the first game before you play this masterpiece. The gameplay itself is great and is backed up more with the characters. Everyone should have this game, and if you don't, what are you doing.
Co-Op was exciting; every level brought in a new challenge. The mechanics took some time to get used to, but it was fairly intuitive overall.
Oyunu bitirseniz bile beyninizi yakacak seviyede topluluk haritalarını oynayabilirsiniz, mükemmel bir oyun herkese tavsiye ederim.
This is the best game that I have ever played.
this game is great and i would highly reccomend

I highly recommend this game. I finished it in two days because I just couldn't stop playing it. The puzzles are fun and challenging but not to the point of incredible frustration. I love every second of the game and I wished there was more to play through because I loved it so much. 10/10 would play again and again.
One of the best gaming experiences out there.

Normalde inceleme yazacağım oyunlar için ne çok uzun ne çok kısa birkaç cümle yazar ve oyunun sevdiğim-sevmediğim yönlerinden bahsederim fakat bu oyun için kötü bir yön bulamıyorum. Az önce belki de hayatım boyunca bir daha eşine rastlayamayacağım bir oyundan çıktım. Özellikle belirtecek olursam: Hikaye, diyaloglar ve karakterler gelişimi muazzamdı. İlk oyunu bitirdikten hemen sonra oynamaya başlamamın da etkisi olduğunu düşünüyorum çünkü ilk oyunun üzerine eklediği mekanikler kesinlikle çok ama ÇOK başarılıydı. 

Çıkalı çok zaman oldu tabii ki ama eğer (kısa süre önceki ben gibi) oynamamışsanız veya uzun bir süredir başlamayı planlıyorsanız alın oynayın. 10/10
Пройти всем хоть раз в жизни!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I really like this game! Usually I don't like puzzle games but this game really made me think again! I would recommend this game to everyone who likes and doesn't like puzzle games because Portal 2 is the best puzzle game.
Открыл для себя лайвхак по быстрому походу за пивом через портал
Dobrá hra, ale nekupovat v jí v plný cenně nevyplatí se to tolik :D
3rd best game Valve has ever made! The Co-Ops great and Story mode is Top Tier.

The story is brilliantly and humourously written and delivered. And while I feel that the puzzles in the story are less engaging and there is less opportunity to play around with the mechanics than there were in the first Portal game,there is ample opportunity to have fun in with those elements in the community made test chambers and the co-op mode. This is very much a worthy successor to a wonderful game.
jogo top demais!!! todos deveriam jogar
I love this game and you will too just download please!
This game.., this game.., is something i can't describe
Мне нравится все ето графика ефекты

Amazing game! Great puzzles and continuing story from the first game, a big community worth of custom maps that'll keep your coming back for more.
